ONLINE ORDERING:

  [vu_list_item_check] It is better to order your online orders well in advance to ensure availability.[/vu_list_item_check] [vu_list_item_check] Our Customer Service Representatives will confirm your online orders by email, if for any reason you do not receive any feedback within 24 hours, your order is not confirmed, we kindly request that you call +962-777-161717 for confirmation.[/vu_list_item_check] [vu_list_item_check] Same day orders are requested to be placed before 1:00pm[/vu_list_item_check][vu_list_item_check] The Cakerys kitchen is closed on Fridays, you can contact our shop at +962-6-5922566 to choose from whats available.[/vu_list_item_check][vu_list_item_check] Online payment is currently not available; we would appreciate payment upon delivery or pick up.[/vu_list_item_check][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" vu_vertical_align="middle"][vc_single_image image="71" img_size="full" el_class="m-b-0"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="in_container" bg_parallax="" color_overlay="" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class="m-b-70"][vc_column vu_vertical_align="middle"][vu_order_form title="Order Form" subtitle="Want the product? item.title: Jobs
item.dc:creator: milingona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="in_container" bg_parallax="" color_overlay="" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class=""][vc_column vu_vertical_align="middle"][vu_title title="Come and Work at Bakery" subtitle="" style="vu_inline" alignment="center" class=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="in_container" bg_parallax="" color_overlay="" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class="m-b-50"][vc_column width="1/2" vu_vertical_align="middle"][vc_column_text]
 
Bakery is a fast-growing company committed to hiring the best bakers, cake decorators, sales and support staff. We are expanding every day due to the hard work and dedication of each and every staff member. This is a dedicated team that strives to achieve the impossible with every cake design and project bigger and better than the last.
Bakery is always looking for friendly, dedicated people to add to our team of hard-working employees.
If you are interested in joining our team, please fill out an application and return it, along with a copy of your resume, to one of our stores.
You may also email your application and resume to us at jobs@bakery.com.
We look forward to hearing from you![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" vu_vertical_align="middle"][vu_contact_form title="" name_text="Name" email_text="Email" show_phone="" subject_text="Subject" submit_text="Submit Message" class=""][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Menu List
item.dc:creator: milingona
item.content:encoded: [vc_row type="in_container" bg_parallax="" color_overlay="" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class="" css=".vc_custom_1439884278864{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" vu_vertical_align="middle"][vu_title title="Bread" subtitle="" style="vu_inline" alignment="left" class=""][vu_menu_item image="28" title="Baguettes" description="Baguettes! We hand form and bake them every morning in time to deliver fresh to local stores within a couple hours." style="list" price="$4.99" link="" class=""][vu_menu_item image="38" title="Ciabatta" description="Ciabatta is a somewhat irregular, slightly dusty loaf- so named, apparently because of its resemblance to a slipper or shoe." style="list" price="$11.00" link="" class=""][vu_menu_item image="6" title="Sesame Wheat" description="Another original variety for O Bread and still one of our most popular. Whole grain wheat and rye;" style="list" price="$15.99" link="" class=""][vu_menu_item image="27" title="Chocolate Cherry" description="As far as we know, originally credits for this delight go to Nancy Silverton of La Brea fame. Is it bread or is it pastry?" style="list" price="$26.49" link="" class=""][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" vu_vertical_align="middle"][vu_title title="Cookies" subtitle="" style="vu_inline" alignment="left" class=""][vu_menu_item image="37" title="Ginger Molasses" description="The best ginger molasses cookies sweet enough but not too sweet, these big gingery cookies are full of flavor." style="list" price="$12.00" link="" class=""][vu_title title="Cakes" subtitle="" style="vu_inline" alignment="left" class="-m-t-60"][vu_menu_item image="34" title="Coffee Cake" description="Organic whole wheat pastry flour & whole wheat pastry flour, molasses, Vermont honey, sesame tahini, organic sugar." style="list" price="$15.75" link="" class=""][vu_title title="Pastries" subtitle="" style="vu_inline" alignment="left" class="-m-t-60"][vu_menu_item image="30" title="Croissant" description="The paper-thin crust, slightly crisp and caramelized, gives way to a tender satisfying interior; rich flavor, mildly sweet." style="list" price="$3.50" link="" class=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="in_container" bg_parallax="true" vu_parallax_image="74" color_overlay="rgba(255,255,255,0.8)" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class="" css=".vc_custom_1439744510639{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6" vu_vertical_align="middle"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3" vu_vertical_align="middle" css=".vc_custom_1439743177421{margin-top: 50px !important;}"][vu_menu_item image="29" title="Red Velvet Cake" description="These are big chocolate chip cookies! A great dessert or sweet snack, these cookies have only the finest ingredients; Belgian chocolate chips and chunks of organic walnuts...organic sugar and sweet butter." style="list" price="$12.45" link="" class=""][vu_menu_item image="28" title="Baguettes" description="Baguettes! We hand form and bake them every morning (except, currently, Thursdays) in time to deliver fresh to local stores within a couple hours. item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: milingona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="in_container" bg_parallax="" color_overlay="" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class=""][vc_column vu_vertical_align="middle"][vu_title title="About Bakery" subtitle="See our big range of departaments, whe offer a lot of attention to our patients see what fits you and give us a call" style="vu_overline" alignment="center" class=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="in_container" bg_parallax="" color_overlay="" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class=""][vc_column width="1/2" vu_vertical_align="middle"][vc_single_image image="71" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" vu_vertical_align="middle"][vc_column_text]

Our Business

Since 1997, The Cakery has been producing its high quality product on the popular Burlingame Avenue. Partners Hilmar Maier and Robert McMonigle felt that Burlingame was the perfect location to continue their centuries old trade while keeping their product current and exciting. What makes The Cakery unique is that every item is crafted in the traditional methods that were common to the trade before the modernization of factories and big box outlets. They whip their eggs and cream their butter and sugar following recipes that are timeless and unforgettable. They offer a full line of cakes, cookies and pastries all made with the finest ingredients available.  

Who We Are

While tradition is important at The Cakery, so are the current needs and trends of the ever changing customer. New menu items such as an entire line of gourmet cupcakes grace the showcase on a daily basis for those with dietary needs, Gluten free products, sugar free cakes, low sugar Stevia cookies, are also available.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="in_container" bg_parallax="" color_overlay="" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class=""][vc_column vu_vertical_align="middle"][vc_column_text]
We work all the time with our customers and together we are able to create beautifull and amazing things that surely brings positive results and complete satisfaction.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="in_container" bg_parallax="true" vu_parallax_image="73" color_overlay="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class="p-t-40" css=".vc_custom_1439884200686{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column vu_vertical_align="middle"][vc_column_text]

Video Presentation

[vu_embed src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/OhtG_XahQco?controls=0&showinfo=0"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="in_container" bg_parallax="" color_overlay="" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class=""][vc_column vu_vertical_align="middle"][vu_title title="Staff" subtitle="Main core of our company is our staff" style="vu_overline" alignment="center" class=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="in_container" bg_parallax="" color_overlay="" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class="" css=".vc_custom_1439883950814{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column vu_vertical_align="middle"][vu_personnel layout="4" show_name="1" show_content="" show_social="1" class="" query="size:4|order_by:date"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_width_content" bg_parallax="true" vu_parallax_image="" color_overlay="rgba(253,184,34,0.9)" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class="m-b-50" css=".vc_custom_1430751136865{background-image: url(http://themes.milingona.co/bakery-demo/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/testimonials-bg.jpg?id=158) !important;}"][vc_column vu_vertical_align="middle"][vu_testimonials show_avatar="1" show_name="1" autoplay="5000" class="" query="size:All|order_by:date|post_type:testimonial"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Home V2
item.dc:creator: milingona
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="full_width_content" bg_parallax="" color_overlay="" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class=""][vc_column vu_vertical_align="middle"][rev_slider_vc][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="in_container" bg_parallax="" color_overlay="" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class=""][vc_column vu_vertical_align="middle"][vu_title title="About Us" subtitle="We love restaurants as much as you do. Thats why weve been helping them fill tables since 1999. Welcome to our restaurant" style="vu_inline" alignment="center" class=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="in_container" bg_parallax="" color_overlay="" vu_equal_height_columns="" row_id="" el_class=""][vc_column width="1/2" vu_vertical_align="middle"][vc_single_image image="71" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" vu_vertical_align="middle"][vc_column_text]

The History

The History of Kitchens and Cooks gives further intimation on Mr Boulanger usual menu, stating confidently that "Boulanger served salted poultry and fresh eggs, all presented without a tablecloth on small marble tables". Numerous commentators have also referred to the supposed restaurant owner's eccentric habit of touting for custom outside his establishment, dressed in aristocratic fashion and brandishing a sword According to Miss Spang, there is not a shred of evidence for any of it. She said: These legends just get passed on by hearsay and then spiral out of control. Her interest in Boulanger dates back to a history of food seminar in Paris in the mid-1990s[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_width_content" bg_parallax="true" item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: milingona
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.dc:creator: milingona
item.content:encoded: But the placing of the cap-sheaf to all this blundering business was reserved for the scientific Frederick Cuvier, brother to the famous Baron. In 1836, he published a Natural History of Whales, in which he gives what he calls a picture of the Sperm Whale. Before showing that picture to any Nantucketer, you had best provide for your summary retreat from Nantucket. In a word, Frederick Cuvier's Sperm Whale is not a Sperm Whale, but a squash. Of course, he never had the benefit of a whaling voyage (such men seldom have), but whence he derived that picture, who can tell? Perhaps he got it as his scientific predecessor in the same field. Desmarest, got one of his authentic abortions; that is, from a Chinese drawing. And what sort of lively lads with the pencil those Chinese are, many queer cups and saucers inform us. item.title: Sourdough Bagels
item.dc:creator: milingona
item.content:encoded:
Though in many natural objects, whiteness refiningly enhances beauty, as if imparting some special virtue of its own, as in marbles, japonicas, and pearls; and though various nations have in some way recognised a certain royal preeminence in this hue; even the barbaric, grand old kings of Pegu placing the title Lord of the White Elephants above all their other magniloquent ascriptions of dominion; and the modern kings of Siam unfurling the same snow-white quadruped in the royal standard; and the Hanoverian flag bearing the one figure of a snow-white charger; and the great Austrian Empire.
Giving the white man ideal mastership over every dusky tribe; and though, besides, all this, whiteness has been even made significant of gladness, for among the Romans a white stone marked a joyful day; and though in other mortal sympathies and symbolizings, this same hue is made the emblem of many touching, noble thingsthe innocence of brides, the benignity of age.
